extendedInfo.description: Formally "Attention Grabber Note Widget"A unique home screen note Widget App! When you place a Note on your screen with this app the screen note automatically changes colors periodically! Your screen notes and reminders will always grab your attention. "I use Attention Grabber Note Widget because it actually helps me pay attention to the note and reminds me of its message." - Jessica Cam Wong (makeuseof.com)"It works Everything else on homescreen gets ignored, this always gets my attention! " - Play Store User ReviewHow it works:Do you put screen notes on your home screen to remind you of something? After a while the screen note disappears from your awareness because your brain gets use to the color and position of the screen note. This is called Brain Adaptation. You actually stop seeing the note causing the message you are trying to keep in mind to become lost in the background.The Attention Note Widget solves this problem by randomly changing the text and background colors of your screen notes. The changing colors of the note will grab your attention causing to take notice of it.Features:- 192 different text and background color combinations- 12 different widget sizes: 1x1, 2x1, 2x2, 3x1, 3x2, 3x4, 4x1, 4x2, 4x4, 5x5, 6x5, and resizable- Ability to rotate between multiple screen notes in the same screen widget! Four notes are allowed in the Ad-Support version. Unlimited notes are allowed with the purchase of the Attention Note Widget Plus Key.- 9 different time durations between changes: 30 minutes, - 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 24, 48 hours, and randomly between 6 and 24 hours- Does not use any long running services. Uses the Android Alarm Manager. Thus, will not affect battery life. If you have any question, comments, suggestions, or are having issues using this application please send me an email at:developer@dancingdroid.com Or, visit http://www.dancingdroid.com/?page_id=1344" and click on the support link at the bottom to post a message in the discussion forum.I cannnot help resolve your issue if you only post it in a review.Ideas for use:- Priorities reminders- To do reminders- Goals reminders- Motivation quotes- Encourage new habits by keeping them on the top of your mind- Religious/Spiritual quotes- Personal mission statement- Personal mantra- Affirmations- Declarations- Gratitude list- New Year's resolutionsSimilar Apps:Color Note, Memo Widget, Go Note, seNotes, Desk Notes, Sticky Note, FastNotes Sticky Note WidgetSearch Terms:Note Widget, Memo Widget, Reminder Widget, Top of mind, Sticky Note, Attention Grabber, Post-it note, Color Change, Color Rotation, Text color widget, background color widget, idea reminder widget, visual queues, visual reminder, personal development, affirmation, declarations, motivation quotes, quick reminder, goals, goals list, goal reminder, desktop notes, desktop reminders, gratitude list, new year's resolutions, random color change, priority focus, priorities reminder, priorities, focus, inspiration quotes, religious quotes, famous quotes, success quotes, daily reminders, on screen notes, home screen notes, home page notes, screen memo, screen note, screen reminder

reviews.title: WTF
reviews.comment: Ill give it 1,000,000,000 000 if I could SPAM SPAM SPAM F****en spam every where on my home screen
reviews.author: lina T

reviews.title: Improvements
reviews.comment: Is it possible to set the timing for the text to change? I waited for a day and it is still displaying the same note. Otherwise its perfect. I bought the ad free version too.
reviews.author: Ace Lee

reviews.title: Fair sticky reminder
reviews.comment: Used to use Color Notes\' widgets as sticky reminders but they\'re not as easy to edit now. This works but UI needs some work such as a way to view all notes after opening a widget note. It\'s also quite a nuisance seeing the screen flash briefly when scrolling. Graphics could look nicer. Could have different note types such as a tap to check off to do list.
reviews.author: Jay Yeung

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is an exciting way of keeping notes w color changes it helps remind u of notes

reviews.title: Really good!
reviews.comment: Great easy and simple. Thanks!

reviews.title: HElP....
reviews.comment: One of the best apps i have... Only problem is it says notes are resizable but I cant find how to resize them once created. Other than that, perfect app! :)

reviews.title: Attention Grabber
reviews.comment: Awesome.  Saves my butt weekly. To clear your list you simply open the actual app instead of the widget,  tap on the note and get a menu offering the choice to delete. ENJOY the rest. It\'s easy!

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for. Enough customization to make it look how you want, but not so many it detracts from the purpose.  I\'m sure I\'ll use it beyond the reason I downloaded it... will probably ditch the boring sticky notes!
